headline: Progress Rail Settlement Eases Legal Overhang For Caterpillar Investors
summary: Progress Rail, a subsidiary of Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT), has settled an antitrust legal dispute with Wabtec. The settlement resolves ongoing litigation and allows both companies to remain suppliers of freight locomotives and cab components. The resolution removes a source of uncertainty tied to Progress Rail’s role in the freight rail market. Caterpillar, through Progress Rail, is a key supplier to the freight rail sector, alongside its broader presence in construction and mining equipment...
